artist: Artist: Vincent Trefex , et al.; Publisher: Délirium Catholic Circus, Teurthéville-Hague, France
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, figure printed in beige and black screenprint, with designs and text printed in red offset lithography, on gray wove paper covers; 40 pp.
inscription:
front cover, black ink pen: jolies et plaines de sang
Rear cover, black ink pen: (abundance of inscriptions and drawings)
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, collage element, screenprint, letterpress; bound volume
title: Purée Noire, no. 4
